categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic installations

nodes.text: A base was constructed in the Fellio Asteroid Belt by the Rebel Alliance during the Imperial Era.

The rebel base appeared in the first issue of the 2019 comic-book series Star Wars: Target Vader, which was written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Marc Laming and Cris Bolson, and published by Marvel Comics on July 3, 2019.
